name: Ecommerce Recruiter.com
tag_list: recruiting, staffing, jobs, recruiter, hiring, executive-search, employment, recruitment, recruiters, search, talent, headhunter
overview:
EcommerceRecruiter.com offers contingency-based recruiting services throughout the Shop.org, IR-500, eTail, SEMPO, and Ad:Tech communities. We operate both domestically and internationally, and have closed Manager, Director, VP, and CXO-level ecommerce searches for the following companies:
